about_the_game:
A puzzle game based on the Five Elements of ancient Chinese philosophy, showcasing the process of the generation and evolution of all things in a simple and concise manner. Here, you are the protagonist little ghost. In the evolution of your life, you will possess different skills (such as transforming into a greedy ghost, a clever ghost, or a miser, etc.), and you will use the power of the Five Elements to explore and break through numerous levels all the way forward, all for the purpose of leading to such a result, the place you want to reach.

Charm of the Five Elements


As an important ideology of traditional Chinese culture, when the Five Elements theory is applied to personal life, family and career fields, the five elements represent growth, passion, stability, value, and flow, providing guidance for us to understand the world, understand ourselves, and create and balance life.

Wood (growth) represents growth and development, symbolizing vitality and creativity.
Fire (passion) represents passion and vitality, symbolizing passion and motivation.
Soil (stability) represents stability and carrying capacity, symbolizing land and social foundation.
Gold (value) represents value and accumulation, symbolizing wealth and order.
Water (flowing) represents fluidity and flexibility, symbolizing wisdom and potential.

Power of the Five Elements


The power of the Five Elements originates from the principle of mutual generation and restraint in the Five Elements. According to this rule, you can manipulate the five elements to transform them into each other, in order to achieve a balance of power or guide the goals and results you want to achieve.



The order of the five elements generates each other:
wood generates fire, fire generates soil, soil generates gold，metal generates water, and water generates wood.

The order of the five elements restrains each other:
water restrains fire, fire restrains gold, gold restrains wood, wood restrains soil, and soil restrains water.

Game Features


Based on the rules of mutual generation and restraint of the Five Elements, it is easy to understand and has infinite changes
Combining various little ghost rules and destiny rules to make the game more interesting
The game includes 108 levels, balancing fun and difficulty
Built in level editor and creative workshop to satisfy your desire to create levels

name: Five Elements: Ghosts Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Here, you are the protagonist little ghost, and you will have different skills and use the power of the Five Elements to reach the place you want to reach.

English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
